components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Drillisch 1&1 Network in Germany

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Drillisch 1&1 network in Germany. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Drillisch 1&1 network in Germany. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
We are investigating an issue impacting toll-free and 10DLC provisioning/cancellations. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Wind Tre and TIM Networks in Italy for a Subset of Long Codes

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Wind Tre network in Italy for a subset of long codes. In addition, TIM network in Italy is also affected. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Wind Tre network in Italy for a subset of long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Wind Tre network in Italy for a subset of long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Wind Tre network in Italy for a subset of long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Wind Tre network in Italy for a subset of long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting Team is conducting planned maintenance on Sunday, September 21, 2024, at07:30 PM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 6 hours. During the maintenance window, Insights Historical Dashboards will be available, but the most recent data may not be immediately available.

Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 September 2024 at 23:00 PDT until 23 September 2024 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from US handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Germany and France Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Germany and France are conducting a planned maintenance from 23 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 23 September 2024 at 18:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures to Twilio Germany, and to and from Twilio France phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Austria, United Kingdom and Italy Account Security Carriers Partners Maintenance - Drei, Three and Wind Tre

incident_updates.body:
Our carriers partners Drei Austria, Three United Kingdom and Wind Tre Italy are conducting a planned maintenance from 23 September 2024 at 21:30 PDT until 23 September 2024 at 23:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carriers and countries: Drei Austria, Three United Kingdom and Wind Tre Italy customers.
